page_description: The article describes a cold chicken salad recipe. It is presented as a healthy and versatile option, perfect for those days when one spends the whole day away from home and needs a quick and easy meal.  The recipe includes ingredients like chicken breast, carrots, celery, and Greek yogurt.  It highlights the salad's convenience, health benefits (protein-rich and gluten-free), and long shelf life (up to 3 days in the refrigerator).  The preparation steps are detailed, making it easy to follow. The article also includes nutritional information (calories, fats, carbohydrates) and shares options for sharing the recipe on social media.
